LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="d65fad56be8e422f8e920a5ce6721a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just wanted to apologize.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't
really do much for you under these,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]difficult circumstances.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d65fad56be8e422f8e920a5ce6721a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I'm acting as the leader of a research
task force.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though its members are
all so skilled they hardly need me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d65fad56be8e422f8e920a5ce6721a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]What I mean is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm technically the leader,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but the others are the stars of the
operation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They make my job easy.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="fffc192f26364616bb3a2d8b1e5c2828" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is it OK if I ask a little favor of you?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fffc192f26364616bb3a2d8b1e5c2828" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]From what I can see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not all of the
task-force members have been found.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fffc192f26364616bb3a2d8b1e5c2828" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I know you're very busy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] believe me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
I'd appreciate it if you could also find
and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]rescue my missing team members[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fffc192f26364616bb3a2d8b1e5c2828" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]If there's anyone who can do this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it's you!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="8700b046b8294ed99d9d8b19e77993f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I can't help wondering if the others are
alright.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm pretty worried about them...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8700b046b8294ed99d9d8b19e77993f7" Scale="1"/]Worried enough that I'm not sleeping well
at night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so my eyelids get sooo heavy
during the day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8700b046b8294ed99d9d8b19e77993f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ugh![etc:Wait frame="15"/] C'mon, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf04"/]Chet[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] get it together![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't
let a little sleepiness get me down!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="772361e7269646f6bbd453af021bfbf0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] great job on another day of hard
work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With you around,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Rescue Corps
has nothing to worry about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="772361e7269646f6bbd453af021bfbf0" Scale="1"/]Everyone in my task force does such
excellent work, too, that there's not much
for me to do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Usually I just end up napping.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="772361e7269646f6bbd453af021bfbf0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]They get the work done like the pros they
are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're pretty amazing.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="51ae8fd3712449d1a0c8d23db7b4750f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What's my job?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess you
could say I stay out of the way and nap
a lot.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51ae8fd3712449d1a0c8d23db7b4750f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I'm joking![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I take care of environmental
concerns so the others are free to
immerse themselves in their research.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="a530887a33b24309a10a47114a707dbb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Chef [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] hasn't been found yet, huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a530887a33b24309a10a47114a707dbb" Scale="1"/]That's unfortunate.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has a way with
food...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The aroma...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The flavor...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I get
hungry just thinking about it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a530887a33b24309a10a47114a707dbb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm a huge fan of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s cooking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My
reasons for wanting him on this expedition
might have been a little self-serving,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ha!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="646c745d86a24a31bc43bf0dfbaa2f09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Everyone's talking about how amazing
you are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="646c745d86a24a31bc43bf0dfbaa2f09" Scale="1"/]The Rescue Corps's reputation has really
skyrocketed thanks to you!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="378d07461ee74a669ee1045148239f37" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We have a botanist, a biologist, a geologic
surveyor, a meteorologist, an ecologist,
and even an archaeologist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="378d07461ee74a669ee1045148239f37" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]All my researchers are experts in their
fields.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They carry the weight of their
homeworlds' expectations with them.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="b5e2ebf834184aa29ab63bbed6c101d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks to your saving [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have access
to delicious foods again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5e2ebf834184aa29ab63bbed6c101d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]With all of this going on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll bet everyone
is completely exhausted.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe I'll ask
for some comfort food for us.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5e2ebf834184aa29ab63bbed6c101d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Heh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder if he could whip up a meal
using local wildlife![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5e2ebf834184aa29ab63bbed6c101d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]On second thought,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't imagine anyone
would want to eat that.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="13eca3e5e9744fd28a66a2f28cc5be0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Our team came here at the request of
the Interstellar Federation to investigate
this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="13eca3e5e9744fd28a66a2f28cc5be0e" Scale="1"/]Would it make a good living environment?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What are the natural resources like?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're here to collect info to help everyone.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="9639209516d94ad9aa7a21f65e806aaa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You two are simply amazing![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You brought
them all back safely.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9639209516d94ad9aa7a21f65e806aaa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I really want to give you something,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] but all
I have is this.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope you'll accept it.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="992d0d6c956d488bba1f32a777387b19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You really did some fantastic work for us![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thank you both!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="41cce01ac6114217b731b0462491e18a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You two sure are something special.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You
saved everyone in my research task force
like it was nothing![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41cce01ac6114217b731b0462491e18a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]This is all I have to give you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope you
can find a way to use it.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="71342ea3853d49aaafd2721ea6ea224a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You really did some fantastic work for us![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thank you both!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="8a4eea1d6f2f4b208d0b963b09dc6184" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But why did everyone crash here in the
first place?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Was it all just bad luck?
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="e74de00d227b4f9abb8147dd2a996b43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You two have saved so many lives.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I honestly can't thank you enough.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e74de00d227b4f9abb8147dd2a996b43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But this planet's a big place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's hope
that there aren't any more crash victims
stuck out there.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="fb0187744c19402fbada76d8e9a94a9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Weather's nice today.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Makes me want to
fill up on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s food and take a long nap.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="f1ba5f74d9a442998b1f90c2e6108c1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] great job on another day of hard
work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With you around,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Rescue Corps
has nothing to worry about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1ba5f74d9a442998b1f90c2e6108c1f" Scale="1"/]Everyone in my task force does such
excellent work, too, that there's not much
for me to do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Usually I just end up napping.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1ba5f74d9a442998b1f90c2e6108c1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]They get the work done like the pros they
are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're pretty amazing.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="e3b7a0b495554dbb84a2db871d6fce52" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What's my job?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess you
could say I stay out of the way and nap
a lot.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e3b7a0b495554dbb84a2db871d6fce52" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I'm joking![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I take care of environmental
concerns so the others are free to
immerse themselves in their research.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="fc0602e0c3ef40e6b3ce3ccc81cf6760" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Everyone's talking about how amazing
you are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fc0602e0c3ef40e6b3ce3ccc81cf6760" Scale="1"/]The Rescue Corps's reputation has really
skyrocketed thanks to you!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="febf3066952044cfa3539739ba1f6c8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We have a botanist, a biologist, a geologic
surveyor, a meteorologist, an ecologist,
and even an archaeologist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="febf3066952044cfa3539739ba1f6c8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]All my researchers are experts in their
fields.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They carry the weight of their
homeworlds' expectations with them.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="b2d9bcae10e84370baa0b843c8cd7505" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks to your saving [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have access
to delicious foods again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2d9bcae10e84370baa0b843c8cd7505" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]With all of this going on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll bet everyone
is completely exhausted.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe I'll ask
for some comfort food for us.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2d9bcae10e84370baa0b843c8cd7505" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Heh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder if he could whip up a meal
using local wildlife![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2d9bcae10e84370baa0b843c8cd7505" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]On second thought,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't imagine anyone
would want to eat that.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="06aa8cb461244682bfd9ba7901bb69e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Our team came here at the request of
the Interstellar Federation to investigate
this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="06aa8cb461244682bfd9ba7901bb69e7" Scale="1"/]Would it make a good living environment?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What are the natural resources like?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're here to collect info to help everyone.
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="faaf6cab2f92419d8a6c69bff651ecc8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh, hey there, buddy![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Look who's super
happy today!
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="67a7f8a50c004159b8fc7a904bfaf1aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well, aren't you just so fluffy and soft![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Want to kick back for a nap with me?
LF019.LF019_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="46ca5a425fca44c18ef28b818c4dd479" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Whoa,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] am I looking at myself here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How
interesting![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could this be a dream?
